name: Date Night (itch) (ArkayGames)
description:
Date Night isn't a dating game like the others! Manage a bar and help monsters to find  their Soul mate alongside Anteros! Help Anteros during 5 days in the Soul Bar and prove to his brother Eros that even monsters can fall in love and find their soulmate!! 

In this game you'll find :

- A short funny story!

- More than 30 differents monsters to match! 

- Talk to each of them and see what they like!

-5 levels where you will need to find the perfect match for these monsters!

Analyse every monsters' informations to find their soul mate! Drag and drop them at a table and see if they match!

This short 2D game was made in 3 months for a school project, and our goal was to release it on there so we hope everyone appreciate it! Don't forget to leave a comment for a feedback.

The team : 

- Alicia Maurice (Coloring/UI/Background Design/Assets)

- Mathieu Girbal (Sound Design/UI)

- Manon Arnault (Animation/Character Design)

-Alexandre Montel (Programming/Game Design/Level Design)

-Victor Seguin (Game Design/Programming/Level Design/Narrative Design/Project Management)

Special thanks : Jade Clément
